snippet.title: The Last Case of Benedict Fox - Gameplay Presentation - Future Games Show Gamescom 2022
snippet.description: The Last Case of Benedict Fox's developers Plot Twist walked viewers through some spooky-looking exploration gameplay during the Future Games Show at Gamescom 2022. The Last Case of Benedict Fox is coming in Spring 2023 to PC and Xbox.
